it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.option

Class CoapOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.option.CoapOption
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceptOption, Block1Option, Block2Option, ContentFormatOption, ETagOption, IfMatchOption, IfNoneMatchOption, LocationPathOption, LocationQueryOption, MaxAgeOption, ObserveOption, ProxySchemeOption, ProxyUriOption, Size1Option, Size2Option, UriHostOption, UriPathOption, UriPortOption, UriQueryOption

    public class CoapOption
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable
    CoAP option. CoAP defines a number of options which can be included in a message. Each option instance in a message specifies the Option Number of the defined CoAP option, the length of the Option Value and the Option Value itself.
